searchKeyWordMatch.name: searchKeyWordMatch
searchKeyWordMatch.description: Specifies how multiple search keywords should be matched when filtering results. Allowed values @ANY@, @ALL@. ~ANY~ : Returns results that match any one of the provided keywords (OR condition). ~ALL~ : Returns results that match all of the provided keywords (AND condition).
